# [Interview #894: AMOL Book Tour - Dayton Q&A, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=894#6)

#### Question

Are you going to do any more prequel books for the Wheel of Time?

#### Harriet McDougal

No.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Easy answer.
